Food sourceÔÉÅ

class larvaworld.lib.model.agents._source.Food(**kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: Source

params(amount=PositiveNumber, substrate=ClassAttr, can_be_carried=Boolean, can_be_displaced=Boolean, regeneration=Boolean, regeneration_pos=Parameter, radius=PositiveNumber, pos=NumericTuple2DRobust, odor=ClassAttr, default_color=RandomizedColor, selected=Boolean, visible=Boolean, group=String, unique_id=String, name=String)

Class for representing a source of food in the environment.

amountfloat, default 10.0

The initial amount of food in the source.

substrateSubstrate, default None

The substrate where the agent feeds.

default_colorstr

Default color of the food source.

initial_amountfloat

Initial amount of food in the source.

subtract_amount(amount)

Subtract a given amount of food from the source.

draw(v, filled=None)

Draw the food source on the visualization canvas.

This class extends the Source class to represent food sources specifically.

substrate = Substrate(composition={'glucose': 0.0, 'dextrose': 0.0, 'saccharose': 0.0, 'yeast': 0.0, 'agar': 0.0, 'cornmeal': 0.0}, name='Substrate00346', quality=1.0)ÔÉÅ
subtract_amount(amount)[source]ÔÉÅ

Subtract a given amount of food from the source.

Parameters:ÔÉÅ

amountfloat

Amount of food to subtract.

Returns:ÔÉÅ

float

The actual amount subtracted, which may be less than the requested amount.

Notes:ÔÉÅ

If the source runs out of food, it is deleted from the simulation.

Point agentÔÉÅ

class larvaworld.lib.model.agents._source.Source(**kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: PointAgent

params(can_be_carried=Boolean, can_be_displaced=Boolean, regeneration=Boolean, regeneration_pos=Parameter, radius=PositiveNumber, pos=NumericTuple2DRobust, odor=ClassAttr, default_color=RandomizedColor, selected=Boolean, visible=Boolean, group=String, unique_id=String, name=String)

Base class for representing a source of something in the environment.

can_be_carriedbool, default False

Whether the source can be carried around.

can_be_displacedbool, default False

Whether the source can be displaced by wind or water.

regenerationbool, default False

Whether the agent can be regenerated.

regeneration_postuple or None, default None

Where the agent appears if regenerated.

is_carried_byobject or None

Reference to the agent that is currently carrying this source.

step()

Perform a step in the simulation, possibly updating the source‚Äôs position.

This class is a base class for representing various types of sources in the environment.
